sentences.translation: 他们态度轻蔑，不屑一顾。

sentences.sentence: A white receptionist asked sneeringly whether he could read.
sentences.translation: 记得他在递交大学申请的路上向人打听途径，一名白人接待员以轻蔑的口气问他是否能够阅读。

sentences.sentence: Critics sneeringly call the PDP the "poverty development party" and say it has "more skeletons in its cupboards than rested souls at Lagos's Atan Cemetery".
sentences.translation: 批评者戏称PD P为“发财党”并且说“在其拉各斯的总部里到处都是不能见人的秘密”。
